controllable_unit_lookup_request.description: Request schema for controllable unit lookup operations

end_user.description: Birth number or organisation number of the end user.

controllable_unit.description: The business ID of the controllable unit to lookup.

accounting_point.description: The accounting point ID of the controllable unit(s) to lookup. `GSRN` metering point id.

controllable_unit_lookup_response.description: Response schema for controllable unit lookup operations

accounting_point.description: The accounting point behind which the controllable units are located.

id.description: The surrogate key of the accounting point.

business_id.description: The GSRN metering point ID of the accounting point.

end_user.description: The end user on the accounting point where the controllable units are located.

id.description: The surrogate key of the end user.

controllable_units.description: The controllable units that were found for the given end user or accounting point.

id.description: The surrogate key of the controllable unit.

business_id.description: The business ID of the controllable unit.

name.description: The name of the controllable unit.

technical_resources.description: The technical resources belonging to the controllable unit.

id.description: The surrogate key of the technical resource.

name.description: The name of the technical resource.

details.description: Additional details about the technical resource.

entity_lookup_request.description: Request schema for entity lookup operations

business_id.description: The business identifier of the entity. Person number or organisation number, according to `type`.

name.description: Name of the entity.

entity_lookup_response.description: Response schema for entity lookup operations

entity_id.description: The surrogate key of the entity.

timeline_multi_range.description: Partial timeline data that is relevant to mention, in a notice for instance. Multirange format, i.e., array of start/end timestamp pairs.

valid_from.description: The start time of the timeline section.

valid_to.description: The end time of the timeline section.

notice_data_valid_time_outside_contract.description: Format of the data field in a notice of type no.elhub.flex.*.valid_time.outside_contract

invalid_timeline.description: Part of the timeline where the end user on the CUSP relation does not match the end user on the accounting point.

notice_data_party_missing.description: Format of the data field in a notice of type no.elhub.flex.party.missing

entity.description: Details about the entity owning the missing party.

notice_data_party_outdated.description: Format of the data field in a notice of type no.elhub.flex.party.outdated

entity.description: Details about the possibly new entity owning the party.

notice_data_product_type_not_qualified.description: Format of the data field in a notice of type no.elhub.flex.service_provider_product_suspension.product_type.not_qualified

product_type_ids.description: List of product types that are not qualified.

controllable_unit_status.description: The status of the controllable unit.

controllable_unit_regulation_direction.description: The regulation direction of the controllable unit. `up` means it can be used to increase production or decrease consumption, while `down` means to decrease production or increase consumption.

controllable_unit_grid_validation_status.description: The grid validation status of the controllable unit.

controllable_unit_suspension_comment_vis.description: The level of visibility of the comment.

service_providing_group_bidding_zone.description: The bidding zone that restricts which CUs that can be added to the group. Also known as scheduling area or price area for TSO.

service_providing_group_grid_prequalific.description: The status of the grid prequalification for this service providing group.
The level of visibility of the comment.

service_providing_group_grid_suspension_.description: The level of visibility of the comment.

entity_business_id_type.description: The type of the business identifier.

entity_type.description: The type of the entity, e.g Person, Organisation

party_business_id_type.description: The type of the business identifier.

party_role.description: The role of the party. Currently maps to 1:1 to `type`. E.g. system_operator, service_provider.

party_type.description: The type of the party, e.g SystemOperator, ServiceProvider

accounting_point_balance_responsible_par.description: The direction of the effect on the balance that the BRP takes responsibility for.

service_provider_product_application_com.description: The level of visibility of the comment.

service_provider_product_suspension_comm.description: The level of visibility of the comment.

service_providing_group_product_suspensi.description: The level of visibility of the comment.

controllable_unit_update_request.description: Request schema for update operations - Controllable unit

name.description: Free text name of the controllable unit.

start_date.description: The usage date when the controllable unit is first active.

maximum_available_capacity.description: Maximum continuous active power that the controllable unit can produce or consume, i.e. deliver for balancing and congestion services, in kilowatts.

minimum_duration.description: The minimum activation duration in seconds.

maximum_duration.description: The maximum activation duration in seconds.

recovery_duration.description: The minimum recovery duration between activations in seconds.

ramp_rate.description: The rate of power per unit of time to reach empty or full power for the controllable unit, in kilowatts per minute.

grid_node_id.description: Reference to the node that the controllable unit is connected to.

grid_validation_notes.description: Free text notes on the current grid validation status.

validated_at.description: When the controllable unit was last validated.

entity_update_request.description:
Request schema for update operations - Entity - Natural or legal person

An entity is a natural or legal person that can be a party in the Flexibility Information System.

Example entity types:

* Person
* Organisation

entity_client_update_request.description: Request schema for update operations - Client linked to an entity for client credentials and JWT grant authentication methods.

name.description: Name of the client.

party_id.description: Reference to the party this client allows to assume. A null value means the client cannot assume any party.

scopes.description:
List of scopes granted to the user when it logs in as an entity or when it acts as the party. When assuming a party through party membership, the least privileged set of scopes will be kept.
Scopes are inspired from OAuth 2.0 and allow refinement of access control and privilege delegation mechanisms.

client_secret.description: The secret of the entity. For use with client credentials authentication method. Input as plain text but stored encrypted.

public_key.description: The public key of the entity (X.509 SubjectPublicKeyInfo). For use with JWT grant authentication method.
